thread.title: Nicely Designed, Good use of space
thread.title_full: Nicely Designed, Good use of space - Review of Chouette Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AAlGhoul
title: Nicely Designed, Good use of space
text:
Clean room, comfortable bed, and good use of space considering the tiny Parisian room dimensions. Breakfast offering was a little slim but what was offered was of good quality. The neighborhood is very residential but the hotel is about a 10 minute walk from a metro station.
Room Tip: Pick a lower floor to avoid the elevator rush See more room tips See all photos
